FORM_DINAR.DESCRIPCION_EVENTO_1: We invite you to our Mollerussa Metal Fest Solidarity Meal, a unique event that combines great metal music with solidarity gastronomy.
FORM_DINAR.DESCRIPCION_EVENTO_2: This special meal is organized by the Mollerussa Metal Fest association as part of our commitment to the community and metal culture.
FORM_DINAR.EXPERIENCIA_UNICA: Don't miss this unique experience of food and live metal!
FORM_DINAR.DONACION_DETALLE: Your contribution will help support research and treatment of childhood cancer

GALERIA.GALERIA_IMAGENES_DESC: Unique moments captured throughout the editions of Mollerussa Metal Fest
GALERIA.CARTELERAS_DESC: Relive previous festival editions through their posters
GALERIA.1GALERIA_IMAGENES_DESC: Discover the most epic moments of Mollerussa Metal Fest through our image gallery.
GALERIA.1CARTELERAS_DESC: Relive previous editions of the festival through their official posters.
GALERIA.HISTORIA_ORIGEN_1: Mollerussa Metal Fest was born in the city of Mollerussa (Pla d'Urgell, Lleida) with the firm intention of giving visibility to the metal, punk, hardcore and related scenes, both at the regional level and throughout Catalan territory.
GALERIA.HISTORIA_ORIGEN_2: The initiative emerged from the visionary mind of Andreu Trullols, with the decisive support of the Culture Department of Mollerussa City Council. The purpose was to create an essential meeting point for the Catalan metal community, a space to enjoy live music, share unique experiences and reclaim the vigorous vitality of this music scene.
GALERIA.HISTORIA_CITA: "More than a festival, we want it to be a meeting between bands and audience, a space for coexistence and respect within the Catalan metal world."
GALERIA.HISTORIA_VALORES_INTRO: Mollerussa Metal Fest stands out for solid principles that make it a unique event:
GALERIA.VALOR_1_DESC: We prioritize Catalan and emerging groups, supporting local talent
GALERIA.VALOR_2_DESC: Beyond a festival, we are a community gathering and statement
GALERIA.VALOR_3_DESC: At Teatre L'Amistat, we guarantee direct and authentic contact
GALERIA.VALOR_4_DESC: Book presentations, gastronomy and meeting points between artists
GALERIA.VALOR_5_DESC: Affordable prices and welcoming atmosphere for everyone
GALERIA.HISTORIA_FUTURO_INTRO: With our eyes on the future, we work to establish MMF as an essential event in the Catalan music calendar. Our strategic objectives include:
GALERIA.OBJETIVO_1_DESC: Creation of a solid legal structure that guarantees continuity and stability
GALERIA.OBJETIVO_2_DESC: Development of parallel cultural and musical activities that enrich the experience
GALERIA.OBJETIVO_3_DESC: Maintaining the local spirit while opening windows to national and international proposals
GALERIA.HISTORIA_IMPACTO_TEXTO: Mollerussa Metal Fest has emerged as a leading reference for alternative music in the Lands of Lleida. Its importance transcends the musical sphere:
GALERIA.HISTORIA_IMPACTO_FINAL: With only two first editions, we have already managed to create a solid community and give a new musical identity to Mollerussa.

LINEUP.DESCRIPCION: The best national and international metal bands will gather in Mollerussa

ACREDITACION.DEBES_ACEPTAR_PRIVACIDAD: You must accept the privacy policy

POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.FINALIDAD_TEXTO: Personal data collected through the accreditation form will be processed for the following purposes:
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.FINALIDAD_1: Manage press and influencer accreditation requests for the event.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.FINALIDAD_2: Verify the provided information and contact the applicant to confirm their accreditation.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.FINALIDAD_3: Provide information related to the event, including schedules, access rules and special activities.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.FINALIDAD_4: Verify the applicant's identity through their ID document number (ID card, passport) and ensure security and access control to the event venue.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.NO_AUTOMATIZACION: No automated decisions will be made nor profiles created with the collected data.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.LEGITIMACION_TEXTO: The legal basis for data processing is:
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.LEGITIMACION_1: The data subject's consent, granted when submitting the form.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.LEGITIMACION_2: The legitimate interest of the organizer in ensuring security and identity verification of accredited persons through their identification document.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.CONSERVACION_TEXTO: Personal data will be retained only for the time necessary to process accreditations and manage the event. After the event, the data - including the ID document number - will be deleted or anonymized, except for those that must be kept by legal obligation or to address possible claims.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.DESTINATARIOS_TEXTO: Data will not be disclosed to third parties, except in the following cases:
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.DESTINATARIOS_1: When necessary for the proper organization of the event (for example, security companies, accreditation staff or technical providers).
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.DESTINATARIOS_2: By legal obligation or request from a public authority.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.NO_TRANSFERENCIAS: Under no circumstances will international data transfers be made without the appropriate guarantees established by current regulations.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.DERECHOS_TEXTO: You can exercise your rights to:
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.DERECHO_ACCESO: Access: know what data we process about you.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.DERECHO_RECTIFICACION: Rectification: request correction of inaccurate data.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.DERECHO_SUPRESION: Erasure: request deletion of your data when no longer necessary.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.DERECHO_LIMITACION: Restriction: request temporary limitation of processing of your data.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.DERECHO_OPOSICION: Objection: object to processing for legitimate reasons.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.DERECHO_PORTABILIDAD: Portability: receive your data in electronic format and transfer it to another controller.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.EJERCER_DERECHOS: To exercise these rights, send a written request along with an identity document to:
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.RECLAMACION: You can also file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (AEPD) if you believe the processing of your data does not comply with regulations:
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.SEGURIDAD_TEXTO: The controller applies appropriate technical and organizational measures to guarantee the confidentiality, integrity and availability of personal data, preventing their alteration, loss, unauthorized processing or access.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.SEGURIDAD_TEXTO_2: In particular, restricted access controls and secure information deletion protocols are established once their purpose has been fulfilled.
POLITICA_PRIVACIDAD.MODIFICACIONES_TEXTO: The controller reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy to adapt it to legislative changes or changes in event management. The current version will always be available on this same page.
